content.description: This problem deals with functions defined by f(x) = x + b sin x , where b is a positive constant and −2π ≤ x ≤ 2π .
content.question: For all values of b > 0 , show that all inflection points of the graph of f lie on the line y = x .

frqParts.text: For all values of b > 0 , show that all inflection points of the graph of f lie on the line y = x .

topic.text: 5.6: Determining Concavity of Functions over Their Domains

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
